mutants.mutated_line: return result if p >= 0 else 1 / result
return result if p <= 0 else 1 / result
return result if p != 0 else 1 / result
return result if p > 0 else 1 * result
return result if p > 0 else 1 // result
return result if p > 1 else 1 / result
return result if p > -1 else 1 / result
return result if p > 1 else 1 / result
return result if p > 0 else 2 / result
return result if p > 0 else 0 / result
return result if p > 0 else 0 / result
return result if p > 0 else -1 / result
